mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_USER (user_id, username, password, nickname, name, email, phone, profile_filename, brith_date, confirm_service, confirm_userinfo, confirm_event) VALUES (USER_ID_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{username}, #{password}, #{nickname}, #{name}, #{email}, #{phone}, #{profile_filename}, #{brith_date}, #{confirm_service}, #{confirm_userinfo}, #{confirm_event})
